content: single_crochet in next 10 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 10 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in last single_crochet 28 single_crochet round 5 2 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet single_crochet in next 12 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 12 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in last single_crochet 32 single_crochet round 6 2 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet single_crochet in next 14 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 14 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in last single_crochet 36 round 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 36 single_crochet round 8 buttonhole round single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet chain 2 skip next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in remaining single_crochet 34 single_crochet 2 chain 1 spaces round 9 *single_crochet in 1st single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet* to chain 2 space single_crochet in chain 2 space *double_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet* around ending with single_crochet round 10 *double_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet* around continue in established pattern of *single_crochet in each double_crochet double_crochet in each single_crochet* around until piece measures 3 5 from beginning do not fasten_off next round buttonhole round single_crochet in next 26 sts chain 2 loosely skip next 2 sts single_crochet in next 8 sts 34 single_crochet 2 chain spaces next round single_crochet in each single_crochet and chain 2 space around join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off leaving long tail for sewing assembly with top buttonhole facing out and bottom hole facing palm sew mitten flap to back of glove even with top of thumb opening fasten_off weave in ends sew one button on palm even with palm buttonhole open mitten flap and sew other button on back
